title: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, some actions are distributed in a way that is not clear to users. It is not acceptable to force users to switch views to access certain actions. All actions should be reachable from the editor, either through the context menu or a global menu.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' was not available on text selection in the editor.
EB: I expected the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' to be available on text selection in the editor.
SR: Ensure that the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is available on text selection in the editor, either through the context menu or a global menu.
